sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react';
import PropTypes from 'prop-types';
import {Flex, Button, Image,Textarea, Box } from '@chakra-ui/react'

SinglePost.propTypes = {
    
};

function SinglePost(props) {
    const commentRef = useRef(0);
    const addCommentOnClick = () => {
        const element = commentRef.current
        element.style.backgroundColor = "red"
    }
    return (
        <Flex
        alignItems="center"
        justifyContent = "center"
        width= "100%"
        min = "160px"
        marginTop={"20px"}
        paddingTop ="60px"
        >
            <Flex
            maxWidth= "600px"
            h="100%"
            alignItems="center"
            justifyContent = "center"
            boxShadow= "2px 2px 2px"
            border="1px solid #fefefe" 
            padding="20px" 
            backgroundColor="#f3e5ee"
            borderRadius="16px"
            position="relative"
            >
                <Image
                borderRadius='100%'
                boxSize='50px'
                src='https://bit.ly/dan-abramov'
                alt='Dan Abramov'
                />
                <Box
                >    
                    <Textarea  
                    margin='6px'
                    display="block"
                    backgroundColor="#ffcaed"
                    borderRadius= "10px"
                    w="300px"
                    padding="6px"
                    marginLeft ="20px"
                    h="20px"
                    _focusVisible={{
                        outline: "none"
                    }}
                    border="none"
                    placeholder='Tiêu đề' />

                    <Textarea  
                    margin='6px'
                    display="block"
                    backgroundColor="#ffcaed"
                    borderRadius= "10px"
                    w="300px"
                    padding="6px"
                    marginLeft ="20px"
                    h="60px"
                    _focusVisible={{
                        outline: "none"
                    }}
                    border="none"
                    placeholder='Bạn đang nghĩ gì' />
                    
                    <Flex alignItems= "center" justifyContent="end">
                        <Button
                        margin="0 8px"
                        w="80px"
                        h="30px"
                        borderRadius = "6px"
                        backgroundColor='#ffcaed'
                        border="none"
                        >
                            Sửa
                        </Button>
                        <Button
                        margin="0 8px"
                        w="80px"
                        h="30px"
                        borderRadius = "6px"
                        backgroundColor='#ffcaed'
                        border="none"
                        onClick={addCommentOnClick()}
                        >
                            Bình luận
                        </Button>
                        <Button
                        margin="0 8px"
                        w="80px"
                        h="30px"
                        borderRadius = "6px"
                        backgroundColor='#ffcaed'
                        border="none"
                        >
                            Xóa
                        </Button>
                    </Flex>
                    <Box ref={commentRef} display = "none">
                        <Textarea  
                        margin='6px'
                        display="block"
                        backgroundColor="#ffcaed"
                        borderRadius= "10px"
                        w="300px"
                        padding="6px"
                        marginLeft ="20px"
                        h="30px"
                        _focusVisible={{
                            outline: "none"
                        }}
                        border="none"
                        placeholder='Bình luận' />
                        <Flex alignItems= "center" justifyContent="end">
                        <Button
                        margin="0 8px"
                        w="80px"
                        h="30px"
                        borderRadius = "6px"
                        backgroundColor='#ffcaed'
                        border="none"
                        >
                            Bình luận
                        </Button>
                    </Flex>
                    </Box>
                </Box>
            </Flex>
        </Flex>
    );
}

export default SinglePost;
